code:
stateDiagram-v2
    direction LR

    [FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> NEW: Thread created
    NEW --> RUNNABLE: thread.start(FinTech_PaymentGateway)

    subgraph Thread Scheduler
        RUNNABLE
        RUNNING
    end

    RUNNABLE --> RUNNING: CPU time allocated
    RUNNING --> RUNNABLE: Yield / Time slice end

    RUNNING --> BLOCKED: Enters synchronized block
    BLOCKED --> RUNNABLE: Exits synchronized block

    RUNNING --> WAITING: object.wait(FinTech_TransactionQueue)
    WAITING --> RUNNABLE: object.notify(FinTech_TransactionQueue) / notifyAll(FinTech_FraudDetection)

    RUNNING --> TIMED_WAITING: Thread.sleep(FinTech_LedgerService) / object.wait(FinTech_LedgerService)
    TIMED_WAITING --> RUNNABLE: Timeout / notify(FinTech_LedgerService)

    RUNNING --> TERMINATED: run(FinTech_PaymentGateway) completes
    TERMINATED --> [FinTech_TransactionQueue]
repo_description: Project for all the article details I have learn day by day
